item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Cult Leader

The Cult Leader

Passive 1: Mithras Power: will appear to be BD, for the first 3 nights (note: only starting CL will have this)

The rest are the same

Ritualist

The Ritualist

Passive 1: Blood Immune: immune to bleeding

Day Ability 1: Cult Barrier: give the cult immunity to all bad affects at night, 2 use.
Day Ability 2: Summon Demons: this one is kind of hard to say so if you want to know what it does go check out my post called New Class Suggestion (Mithras a cult class!)

Night Ability 1: Teleportation: same

Night Ability 2: Brotherhood: exactly the same but now it will protect them from occupation and target change, 3 use

Seeker

The Seeker

Passive 1: Cult Blood: it is basically the same as Will of Mithras

Day Ability 1: Expose: same

Day Ability 2: Seek: discover a player’s class, 1 use

Night Ability 1: Gazer: same as gaze just name changed

Night Ability 2: Identify: same

Apostle

The Apostle

Passive 1: Cult Commune: can communicate to the dead cult members in a different chat box

Passive 2: Cult Diplomacy: you’re whispers can’t be seen

Day Ability 1: Cult Spy: same as maid spy except can only be used 4 times

Day Ability 2: Cult Orb: find out a player’s class type 1 use

Night Ability 1: Cult Snoop: same as snoop, 1 use

Night Ability 2: Cult prediction: same as crier
